HDG.LOG.content: legein: not a mere collecting or coupling of opposites which equalizes contraries, not just a connecting or binding together [Derrida, indifference point]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: legein: not a mere collecting or coupling of opposites which equalizes contraries, not just a connecting or binding together [Derrida, indifference point]

HDG.BC.content: “is” as connecting word must be totally “empty” [khōra] > “to be”: indispensable but fundamentally (im Grunde) empty representation
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “is” as connecting word must be totally “empty” [khōra] > “to be”: indispensable but fundamentally (im Grunde) empty representation

HDG.QB.content: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation
HDG.QB.linkedContent: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation

HDG.FS.content: in Greek, theōria means residing (Sichaufhalten) in gaze (Erblicken) of being; today, theory is a programming? program: Anzeige (indication), vorausgreifende Festlegung (anticipatory establishment), Mitteilung einer Planung (communication of a plan)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: in Greek, theōria means residing (Sichaufhalten) in gaze (Erblicken) of being; today, theory is a programming? program: Anzeige (indication), vorausgreifende Festlegung (anticipatory establishment), Mitteilung einer Planung (communication of a plan)

HDG.FS.content: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: technology not grounded in physics, physics grounded in essence of technology > [Kant establishes program of program] physics observes nature as succession [series, sequence] of things, not as course of things emerging (hervorgehenden) from each other [like Aristotle]

HDG.OHF.content: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]

HDG.OHF.content: Schleiermacher reduced (eingeschränkt) comprehensive/living manner of hermeneutics (Augustine) to “art (technique [Kunstlehre]) of understanding,” discipline connected w/ grammar/rhetoric
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Schleiermacher reduced (eingeschränkt) comprehensive/living manner of hermeneutics (Augustine) to “art (technique [Kunstlehre]) of understanding,” discipline connected w/ grammar/rhetoric

HDG.OHF.content: for Heidegger, hermeneutics (in connection [Anschluss] w/ its original meaning): definite unity in the actualizing (bestimmte Einheit des Vollzugs) of ermēneuein (communication), i.e. of the interpreting (Auslegens) of facticity: encountering, seeing, concept bringing
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: for Heidegger, hermeneutics (in connection [Anschluss] w/ its original meaning): definite unity in the actualizing (bestimmte Einheit des Vollzugs) of ermēneuein (communication), i.e. of the interpreting (Auslegens) of facticity: encountering, seeing, concept bringing

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”

HDG.OHF.content: [re: historical human sciences] [a pre-critique of Foucault?] each culture interrogated re: expressive being of its formation (Ausdruckseins ihrer Gebilde), on basis of its style, bringing into relief (Abhebung) the Gestaltcharaktere des Gestalthaften: morphology > one culture must be held up against another, method of universally comparing forms (Gestaltvergleichung) (homology, analogy, synchronism, parallelism) > “a closed form-endowed context (Zusammenhang) of forms”: totality of historical past explicated in such a way, a flattening down (Niederschlag) [translator frustratingly prefers word condensation here], can be mastered at a glance (in einem Blick), can order via charts/rubrics [classifying (Ordnung)]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [re: historical human sciences] [a pre-critique of Foucault?] each culture interrogated re: expressive being of its formation (Ausdruckseins ihrer Gebilde), on basis of its style, bringing into relief (Abhebung) the Gestaltcharaktere des Gestalthaften: morphology > one culture must be held up against another, method of universally comparing forms (Gestaltvergleichung) (homology, analogy, synchronism, parallelism) > “a closed form-endowed context (Zusammenhang) of forms”: totality of historical past explicated in such a way, a flattening down (Niederschlag) [translator frustratingly prefers word condensation here], can be mastered at a glance (in einem Blick), can order via charts/rubrics [classifying (Ordnung)]

HDG.OHF.content: system as a context of classification (sketch out framework then allocate respective places for concrete beings) > the relational becomes the object proper, pushes to the fore: dominating/pervading everything, it constitutes being in authentic sense > the classificatory is immutable (Unwandelbare), elevated above what it organizes/rules, the trans-temporal in-itself (das überzeitliche Ansich) (being, validity [Gelten], value, subsistence [Bestehen]—contrasts sensible reality)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: system as a context of classification (sketch out framework then allocate respective places for concrete beings) > the relational becomes the object proper, pushes to the fore: dominating/pervading everything, it constitutes being in authentic sense > the classificatory is immutable (Unwandelbare), elevated above what it organizes/rules, the trans-temporal in-itself (das überzeitliche Ansich) (being, validity [Gelten], value, subsistence [Bestehen]—contrasts sensible reality)

HDG.OHF.content: dialectic has same source in error (Fehlerquelle) of that which it wishes to remedy: steps into already constructed context, though really there’s no context here > what’s missing in dialectic: radical fundamental looking (radikale Grundblick) toward and at object of philosophy, from which (on basis of which), aus dem selbst, the How of what is understood emerges in unity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: dialectic has same source in error (Fehlerquelle) of that which it wishes to remedy: steps into already constructed context, though really there’s no context here > what’s missing in dialectic: radical fundamental looking (radikale Grundblick) toward and at object of philosophy, from which (on basis of which), aus dem selbst, the How of what is understood emerges in unity

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.content: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal

HDG.OHF.content: the path hermeneutics of facticity attempts to travel (versucht zu gehen), the forehaving (Vorhabe), interpretively explicated, must be put into context of object (Gegenstandzusammenhang) & seen there (hineingesehen)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: the path hermeneutics of facticity attempts to travel (versucht zu gehen), the forehaving (Vorhabe), interpretively explicated, must be put into context of object (Gegenstandzusammenhang) & seen there (hineingesehen)

HDG.OHF.content: difficulty of untangling context of tightly woven categories, & demonstrating it in intuition, disappears if (always anew) we “hold to the task of appropriating (aneignet) the corresponding position of looking (entsprechenden Blickstand) at it and holding out in (durchält) this looking […] i.e., staying clear of a certain sedimented customary approach” [guard against (auf der Hut ist) slipping back into it unawares (unversehens)—is Heidegger always this vigilant? is attention given to destruction or to Being?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: difficulty of untangling context of tightly woven categories, & demonstrating it in intuition, disappears if (always anew) we “hold to the task of appropriating (aneignet) the corresponding position of looking (entsprechenden Blickstand) at it and holding out in (durchält) this looking […] i.e., staying clear of a certain sedimented customary approach” [guard against (auf der Hut ist) slipping back into it unawares (unversehens)—is Heidegger always this vigilant? is attention given to destruction or to Being?]

HDG.OHF.content: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares

HDG.OHF.content: als bedeutet und bedeutend deuten: das Besorgen [pointing, signifying, care] > etwas bedeutet etwas: hebt es in bestimmten Verweisungszusammenhang, bestimmt sich aus dem Seienden, es ist da [thereness as signifying, as bringing into a definite context of references] — — self-evidence of the “ there ” : das Aufgehen absorption)
